name: Utiler Canyon
description:
Utiler Canyon, a peaceful and sometimes odd walk through a naturalistically mystical landscape.

Spend as much or as little time exploring as you like, the stones, the sands, the cacti and the mysterious structures will sing to you to your hearts content.

Discover hidden treasures that you can collect if you like, they'll make a nice centrepiece if you do. Seek out the natives of the canyon and listen to their musings, or just stand in your favourite place where you can hear just the right combination of sounds.

Take some time to visit Utiler Canyon.

Controls:
WASD - Move
+ Shift to run
E to interact
Spacebar to scroll text

Music, Models, Graphics, Design and Development
by Paws Menu, Michael Berto

Made in just under three days for Slow Game Jam 2017.

(headphones recommended while playing)
